resources.string:
Name: TQR Code Recognition Software Robin 
 Version : 1.0.1 


Instructions for use : 
 
1. Click the Config button to set the server URL, delete temporary files, and select frame splitting/video transfer 
2. Click on Record to start recording 
3. Click Stop to stop recording and automatically upload 
4. Drag the zoom bar to zoom in and out of the video 

 Precautions : 
-Fill in the server URL with "protocol+address+port" 
-Camera and storage permissions are required
